data.name: Worgen
data.description:
Worgen

Units:
+10% attack rate

Buildings:
+1 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Traits: No conventional magic spells but very strong melee unit front line. Can turn into savage beasts exceptionally good at ripping enemy organics apart. Not so great against mechanicals. Weak vs debuffs.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Hypersense Aura
auras.description:
Reveals entire map
Reveals invisible units
(10000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Unholy Aura
auras.description:
+30% unit move speed
(4500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+15% unit attack and move speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Bloodlust Trance [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Feral Instincts

Reduces spell damage to Assassin (both forms), Town Guard (both forms), Hermit, Alpha and Feral Werewolf by 15%. Increases their armor by 2.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Worgen Curse [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Rip and Tear

Gives Alpha and Feral Werewolf a 3/6/9/12% chance to curse their targets and turn them into Werewolves.
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
(can be upgraded in this building)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: King's Guardmen [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Lacerate

Kings Guard replaces Assassin
Melee Unit
-15% attack rate
+8 damage
+2 armor
+25 HP
Abilities: (both forms)
Heavy Weapon (Passive Skill)
(30% for 2x damage, 0.5 sec stun)
(affects mechanical units only)
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
(25% damage in 125 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Bestial Strength
Personel Armor
Lacerate
Worgen Form
Worgen Hunger
Rip and Tear
Feral Instincts

Type: Anti Mechanicals

units.name: Kings Guard
units.description:

+4 damage

(20% to do 2x damage)
(affects strong creeps only)
(affects organic units only)

Personel Armor

Worgen Form
Worgen Hunger

Feral Instincts

units.name: Monster Hunter
units.description:

bonuses.name: Self Control [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Worgen Form

Hermit wil not turn to Alpha with Feral Form
Instead he is affected by Worgen Form
Hermit gains new Abilities:
Healing Hand (Healing Spell)
(50/60/70/80 HP to 3 units)
(affects organic units only)
Abolish Magic (Disable Spell)
(dispels buffs from units)
(has 18/15/12/9 sec cooldown)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Type: Anti Buff \ Unit Power

units.name: Hermit
units.description:
Spellcaster
Strong Vs Melee Unit

skills.name: Serrated Darts (Lv1)
skills.description:

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

bonuses.name: The First Pack [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Worgen Hunger

Some additional werewolves will join you.

Type: Trolling

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power
If you like your Heroes, this makes them even better. Some races depend on them more than others, though.

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [V]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.name: Pawn Item [A]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [S]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [D]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Improved Defenses [C]
bonuses.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Improved Defenses
spells.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Emergency Repair (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Restores 100 HP over 30 sec.
(can affect mechanical units)
(can target your enemy as well)
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.description:

+10% damage reduction

spells.description:

Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.

towerUpgrades.name: Lacerate
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 25% to bleed for 25 sec
Affects: Assassin and Town Guard (both forms)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% slow, 5 damage per sec
Lv2: 15% slow, 10 damage per sec
Lv3: 20% slow, 15 damage per sec
Lv4: 25% slow, 20 damage per sec

towerUpgrades.name: Worgen Form
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to morph on kill
Affects: Assassin and Town Guard
(only when killing organic units)

Lv1: 20% chance, +25 HP, +2 armor
Lv2: 40% chance, +50 HP, +4 armor
Lv3: 60% chance, +75 HP, +6 armor
Lv4: 80% chance, +100 HP, +8 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Feral Instincts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion
Affects: All Werewolves (non-Hero)

Lv1: +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Corrosive Darts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage ability
Affects: Manticore
(affects Air units only)

Lv1: 200 damage, 15 sec CD
Lv2: 400 damage, 12 sec CD
Lv3: 600 damage, 9 sec CD
Lv4: 800 damage, 6 sec CD

towerUpgrades.name: Rip and Tear
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and stun
Affects: All Werewolves (non-Hero)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% for 2x damage, 0.7 sec stun
Lv2: 20% for 2x damage, 0.8 sec stun
Lv3: 30% for 2x damage, 0.9 sec stun
Lv4: 35% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Deafening Roar
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and slow
Affects: Feral Werewolf
(-15% speed for 4 seconds)
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 75 damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: 100 damage in 450 AoE
Lv3: 125 damage in 500 AoE
Lv4: 150 damage in 550 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Serrated Darts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and stun
Affects: Manticore and Guard Tower
(also stuns for 0.8 sec)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10% chance for 15 damage
Lv2: 20% chance for 30 damage
Lv3: 30% chance for 45 damage
Lv4: 35% chance for 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Ultrasound Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces attack rate
Affects: Giant Bat
(affects Air units only)

Lv1: -11% attack rate in 700 AoE
Lv2: -22% attack rate in 900 AoE
Lv3: -33% attack rate in 1100 AoE
Lv4: -44% attack rate in 1300 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Worgen Hunger
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate after a kill
Affects: All Werewolves (non-Hero)
(only when killing organic units)
(heals for 500 hit points)

Lv1: +10% attack rate for 30 sec
Lv2: +20% attack rate for 60 sec
Lv3: +30% attack rate for 90 sec
Lv4: +40% attack rate for 120 sec

(5% chance to become mindless)

heroes.name: Rebel Leader
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Jump Slam (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(250-400 area of effect)

60-90% AS bonus after a kill
(has 15 sec duration)

18-30% melee lifesteal
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Feral Instincts (Passive Skill)
30-40% to evade an attack
